tool_description: These APIs provide data of cryptocurrencies market, ideal for tracking your personal asset profit.
name: Crypto Tracking
title: Crypto Tracking

api_list.name: Coins listed
api_list.description:
Get list of coins supported on this APis.
 The source of price from binance for now.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com/coins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-tracking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
